properties.address: Allestree Community Library, Derbyshire DE22 2QN
properties.description: Derby Libraries will be providing warm spaces with extra seating and free hot drinks to support communities with the cost of living this winter. The spaces will be available to all to relax and connect in a safe, warm, welcoming space. Library staff will be on hand to support people who want to join the library and borrow books as well as sign post people to support and trusted information on the cost of living. There will also be opportunities for people to access a busy regular programme of free activities in the libraries from family rhymetimes to adult book groups. To protect the planet and reduce the use of plastic people are encouraged to bring their own cups into libraries. Everyone is welcome to unlimited refills of tea and coffee. Hot drinks will be available Fridays 10am -1pm
properties.title: Allestree Community Library

properties.description: Open every Wednesday from 10.30am - 2pm with free hot drinks, biscuits, and a community lunch served between 12/12-30 and 1pm. Games, conversation, and magazines available, as well as an informal signposting service for those needing additional support.

properties.address: Derwent Library Revive Healthy Living Centre, Derbyshire DE21 6ET
properties.description: Derby Libraries will be providing warm spaces with extra seating and free hot drinks to support communities with the cost of living this winter. The spaces will be available to all to relax and connect in a safe, warm, welcoming space. Library staff/volunteers will be on hand to support people who want to join the library and borrow books as well as signpost people to support and trusted information on the cost of living. There will also be opportunities for people to access a busy regular programme of free activities in the libraries from family rhymetimes to adult book groups. To protect the planet and reduce the use of plastic people are encouraged to bring their own cups into the libraries. Everyone is welcome to unlimited refills of tea and coffee.Hot drinks will be available Fridays 11-2pm.

properties.address: No 28 Community Hall, Belper, Derbyshire DE56 1FZ
properties.description: We are open every Monday 10am to 4pm. Free tea, coffee and biscuits are available but no other food. A free tutor led craft session is offered most weeks, starting at 1pm. A jigsaw puzzle is usually on the go for you to join in whenever feel like it and is a good icebreaker for conversation. Knitting, crochet, sewing and quilting experts frequent our space, so bring your projects along for inspiration. A limited number of books, magazines and games are available.
properties.title: Happy Monday

properties.title: Marehay Methodist Church

properties.address: New Life Church Derby, Normanton Road, Derby, Derbyshire DE23 6UU
properties.description: Our Warm Space is open to families from 10-12. Parents and toddlers are welcome to build community and friendships. Lunch is provided from 12-2pm for anyone else in the community.
properties.title: New Life Church Derby

properties.address: Werb's Central, Derby, Derbyshire DE1 1BU
properties.description: The Living Room is our new after-school family space. It is a home away from home where families can come and engage in activities, games and crafts and get some free healthy, nutritious food and refreshments. As we enter this winter we want to reach out to the community with a warm space which helps to alleviate some of the pressures facing families.
properties.title: The Living Room

properties.address: The Lonny Wilsoncroft Community Centre, Derbyshire DE1 1GL
properties.description: A community centre located within the New Zealand area of Derby.
properties.title: The Lonny Wilsoncroft

properties.address: Unit 8, St Peters Street DE1 2NR
properties.description: An Energy Hub that has a community room along with a kids table where they can play some games on the available tablets or do some colouring in. We serve hot drinks and run Energy Efficiency workshops, to show how you can save money on your household bills.
properties.title: Utilita Energy Hub (Derby)

properties.address: Ashbourne Elim Pentecostal Church, Derbyshire DE6 1DG
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 4th December 2023** Ashbourne Elim Church provides a welcoming and secure environment. We offer hot drinks, breakfast baps, and toast. There are also games available for entertainment and a play area for children if needed. To ensure safety, at least two DBS-checked personnel will be present at all times. You can find our comprehensive safeguarding policy on our website. Our warm space times are Monday, 9/12, Wednesday, 9/12
properties.title: Warm Space

properties.address: 5 Liversage Street, Derby, Derbyshire DE1 2LD
properties.description: A warm welcoming space for people in Derby who are at risk of homelessness, poverty and social isolation. Free hot meals for breakfast and lunch or emergency food parcels. Shower, toilet and laundry facilities. Support advice and guidance on a range of issues such as healthcare, welfare, housing, debt and unemployment. Wellbeing sessions such as art, music and gardening. All free of Charge
properties.title: Warm Welcome @ Padley
